Description:
Fully Renovated Charm
This immaculately presented weatherboard home has been fully renovated to offer the finest in low maintenance living.
An abundance of natural light flows through well-proportioned spaces which enjoy a neutral colour scheme, Tasmanian Oak floorboards, decorative cornices and discreet blinds.
The home offers a generous living room, and this flows through to a dining area and a Scandi inspired kitchen with white gloss cabinets and stainless steel appliances including a 4-burner cooktop, an underbench oven and a dishwasher that complement the attractive space.
Three sizeable bedrooms run along the side of the home, and these share the use of a modern, fully tiled bathroom with a deep bathtub and an oversized shower. A well-designed laundry space and separate toilet complete the internal accommodation.
Those who love entertaining alfresco style will be thrilled with the undercover deck that runs the full width of the home, ensuring that there is ample space for both lounging and dining whilst protected from the elements; open air play can also be enjoyed in the fully fenced front yard that is framed by established gardens.
Enhancing the home are extras including gas ducted heating, split system heating/air-conditioning, ceiling fans, bistro blinds to deck and a double carport with a remote roller door.
The location is a further drawcard; close to local shopping precincts such as Chirnside Park Shopping Centre, buses with rail links, a number of open green spaces and a range of sought after private and public schools including Yarra Valley Grammar, Oxley College and Luther College.
Whatever your stage in the property cycle, you’ll find something here to love. Inspect without delay and consider where this sensational home figures in your future.

A Taste of Yesteryear with a Grand View
Built in 1950 with only one owner, this character filled weatherboard home will give you a taste of yesteryear and the opportunity to apply your touch to enjoy a relaxed lifestyle.

Step into the dining room which will be the ideal spot for formal occasions such as birthday dinners or Christmas day lunch, whilst your everyday and casual dining will be looked after in the meals area which is set up with a built in dining booth.
The well equipped kitchen will certainly take care of the chef of the families needs to make every meal time shine.

Moving outside your will find the front balcony that will be the ideal spot to enjoy alfresco dining, casual BBQ's, cool afternoon drinks or leisurely weekend breakfasts with a coffee and the paper.
Out the back there is a bungalow for storage or you make like to spruce it up and use as a studio for the budding artist of the family or use the space as Dad's man cave, Mum's she den or the kids play room.
There are well establish gardens front and back that are full of blooms, smells and colour.
The long drive way past the house takes you up to the garage.
All this is within a close distance to Croydon Main street for shopping, cafes, restaurants, cinema's, shopping centres with Coles, Woolworths and Aldi, public transport, schools, parks, playgrounds plus all other facilities you may need.
This home will be an ideal start for 1st home buyers, young families, couples, investors and those who have the vision to add touches of brilliance to an already loved family home.
Be quick and book your viewing today.
